description: octagonal panel in octagonal frame; portrait of a young woman, head turned slightly to PR; woman has brown wavy hair styled in a bun; wearing blue and gold garment; light blue-white background; gold and brown frame
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

See sign on back, in blue ink: [~MARY V STUCK~/ -JULI 1901]
title: Portrait of Mary Stuck
